OPPORTUNITY_ID = #{record.opportunityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

STATE_DATE = #{record.stateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OP_ID = #{record.opId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
